name: Nice English Custard
description:
So simple but so good! Just 2 flavours to make a lovely English custard.

Great standalone, or added to recipes for a custard layer.
author: harrynice

reviews.text: Was just looking for something to play around with the custard prem I finally just got in.  Basic but delicious!  Pretty heavy on the vanilla, I wouldn't want to add anymore.  Nice n thick and eggy just the way a custard should be.  Def tasty vapealone or a good base to throw some fruits in to, FLV boysenberry anyone? :D
